meanings.definition: Having a healthy red color in the face.
meanings.sent1: After playing outside all day, his cheeks were the ruddiest they had ever been.
meanings.sent2: The ripe strawberries were the ruddiest in the basket.
meanings.sent3: She joked that her cat's cheeks turned ruddiest whenever it got into mischief.
meanings.sent4: The setting sun painted the sky in the ruddiest hues, signaling the end of the day.
meanings.sent5: The ruddiest blush spread across her face when she received a compliment.

meanings.definition: Most red or reddish in color.
meanings.sent1: The ruddiest apple in the bunch stood out among the green ones.
meanings.sent2: The autumn leaves turned the forest into the ruddiest landscape.
meanings.sent3: The ruddiest fire truck sped down the street, catching everyone's attention.
meanings.sent4: Her lipstick was the ruddiest shade of red, making a bold statement.
meanings.sent5: The ruddiest poppies swayed in the breeze, a vibrant sight in the field.
